bilingual.target: 交通运输费用在不断增加。
交通运输是城市发展的关键。
现代运输方式使得旅行更加快捷。
火车是一种非常方便的运输方式。

bilingual.source: We need to choose a suitable transportation.
bilingual.target: 我们需要选择一种合适的运输方式。
公共运输方式包括公交车和地铁。

bilingual.source: The government is investing in green transportation.
bilingual.target: 政府正在投资于绿色交通运输。

bilingual.source: We need to improve the public transportation system.
bilingual.target: 我们需要改进公共交通运输系统。

bilingual.source: Water transport is an eco-friendly mode of transportation.
bilingual.target: 水运是一种环保的运输方式。

bilingual.source: We need to find a reliable transportation company.
bilingual.target: 我们需要找到一家可靠的运输公司。

list.abstract: transportation 是一个英语单词，有运输、输送等意思。

yingyinNormal.zh: 可不可以用在交通运输上?

yingyinNormal.en: By adopting the most advanced transportation system in the world: high-speed rail.
yingyinNormal.zh: 通过使用这世界上最先进的交通运输系统：高铁。

yingyinNormal.en: On this side, you'll see panoramic ocean vistas inaccessible to any other form of transportation.
yingyinNormal.zh: 在这边可以看到全海景，任何运输工具都无法做到这点。

yingyinNormal.en: Across this vast and inhospitable land, high-tech transportation and highways are built at an incredible pace.
yingyinNormal.zh: 横亘此广袤无垠的苍茫大地，高科技交通运输系统和高速公路的建设一日千里。

yingyinNormal.en: When it comes to our transportation triumphs and failures, it's the ultimate example.
yingyinNormal.zh: 谈到交通的得与失，这是终极案例。

yingyinNormal.en: Dean, like most of us, depends on a transportation system, that's being pushed to its limits.
yingyinNormal.zh: 迪恩，和我们大多人一样，依靠已经发挥到极致的交通系统。

yingyinNormal.en: Hey. That was a practical purchase. I needed that car for transportation. Okay? I have a child.
yingyinNormal.zh: 那是很实际的一项购买，我需要那车子做交通工具好吗？我有小孩。

yingyinNormal.en: You see those two? They'll trade work for transportation to the Outer Rim. There, you can disappear.
yingyinNormal.zh: 看到那两个人了吗？他们会把货物运往外环星域交易，在那，你可以消失。

yingyinNormal.en: And for families like the Wangs, this cutting-edge transportation is critical for their New Year exodus.
yingyinNormal.zh: 而对于王家人来说，这前沿的交通系统对他们新年回家意义非凡。

yingyinNormal.en: Around the country, kids rely on a half-million-member army of transportation experts, the nation's school bus drivers.
yingyinNormal.zh: 整个国家的孩子都依靠这50万公交专家，这些学校的巴士司机。

yingyinNormal.en: Okay. You know how people need transportation, but they also need massages to help them relax so I just figured we could combine the two.
yingyinNormal.zh: 人们需要交通工具，也需要按摩放松，我们可以结合两者。

yingyinNormal.en: The perpetrators were targeting the government and their ultimate purpose, though foiled, was to disrupt all mid-Atlantic transportation networks.
yingyinNormal.zh: 罪犯的目标是政府，虽然他们的最终目的是干扰大西洋中部的交通网络，但遭挫败。

yingyinNormal.en: Air travel, more than any other mode of modern transportation, has bridged our continent and sped up our lives. And every year, more and more of us are taking to the skies.
yingyinNormal.zh: 航空旅行，对比其他任何现代交通模式，让我们在大陆间更快捷的穿梭每年，我们都有更多的人 选择空中旅行。

yingyinNormal.en: But there are other transportation networks out there that face big challenges, including the system that first connected the country from coast to coast and made modern America possible, the railroads.
yingyinNormal.zh: 但是还有其他交通网络面临着巨大的挑战，包括首次在全国各地启用，让现代美国成为可能的铁路。

direction_info.description:
数据源自2012-2023年12年间全国考研试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2012-2023年全国考研英语一和考研英语二共24套考研试卷，包括阅读、完型填空、翻译、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选全国考研考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2012-2023年12年间全国考研英语一和考研英语二试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

sense_info_list.en: a system or means of transporting people or goods
sense_info_list.zh: 交通运输系统; 交通工具

examination_example.sentence: In one series of studies, researchers instructed Chicago-area commuters using public <highlight>transportation</highlight> to strike up a conversation with someone near them.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 在一系列的研究中，研究者们通知芝加哥地区乘用公共交通的通勤者开始一段和周围人的交流。

examination_example.sentence: A number of companies, particularly in energy and <highlight>transportation</highlight>, use AI image processing technology to inspect infrastructure and prevent equipment failure or leaks before they happen.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 一些公司，特别是在能源和运输领域，使用人工智能图像处理技术来检查基础设施，并防止设备故障或泄漏发生。

examination_example.sentence: The <highlight>Transportation</highlight> Security Administration (TSA) found in a secret check that undercover investigators were able to sneak weapons past airport security nearly every time they tried.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 美国运输安全管理局(TSA)在一次秘密检查中发现，卧底调查人员几乎每次尝试都能把武器偷运通过机场安检。

sense_info_list.en: the action of transporting someone or something or the process of being transported

examination_example.sentence: New research on <highlight>transportation</highlight> biofuels is already under way.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 运输生物燃料的新研究已经在进行中。

exam_freq_info.chinese: 交通运输系统; 交通工具

direction_info.description:
数据源自2016.6-2023.6年8年间全六级试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight>考纲释义</highlight>
精选实考、考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2016-2023年51套试卷，包括阅读、听力、翻译等所有题型。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2016-2023年8年间全六级试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

examination_example.sentence: They know I'm a vegetarian, that I don't wear leather or fur, and that I always use public <highlight>transportation</highlight>.

examination_example.sentence: For this part, you are allowed 30 minutes to write on the topic changes in the Way of <highlight>Transportation</highlight>.

examination_example.sentence: Levels of outdoor pollution have grown rapidly along with rapid growth in industry and <highlight>transportation</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 随着工业和交通的快速增长，室外污染水平迅速上升。

sense_info_list.en: a system or means of transporting people or goods

examination_example.sentence: Each week I take my mother to do her shopping and visit the doctor, providing company and <highlight>transportation</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 每周我都会带我母亲去购物和看医生，提供陪伴和交通。

examination_example.sentence: What if the person who'd taken his bike really needed <highlight>transportation</highlight> to get to work?
examination_example.sentence_trans: 如果那个骑车的人真的需要交通工具去上班呢？

examination_example.sentence: The coming technological advancement presents a chance for cities and states to develop <highlight>transportation</highlight> systems designed to move more people, and more affordably.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 即将到来的技术进步为城市和州提供了发展交通系统的机会，旨在以更低的成本运送更多的人。

direction_info.description:
数据源自2018-2021年4年间全国各省市中考试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2018-2021年全国重点省市中考试卷，包括听力、阅读、完形、单选、填空、改错、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选各省市考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2018-2021年4年间全国各省市中考试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。
